cookie.name: Oreo
cookie.description: This is what a double cookie should be like. Two halves of cocoa with vanilla cream filling: This is the classic among Oreo cookies. Here you get 3 snack packs, each with 3 double cookies. They are ideal to take away and as a small snack between meals.

cookie.name: Dinosaurus
cookie.description: Delicious cookies with a layer of real milk chocolate and a Dinosaur shape for children to have fun at breakfast or snack. They come in comfortable individual bags, the right dose to eat inside or outside the home and are endorsed by the Spanish Pediatric Association.

cookie.name: Maria
cookie.description: Cuétara cookies are made with OletoEquilibre, a nutritionally optimized combination of vegetable oils. Cuétara recommends that you replace saturated fatty acids with unsaturated fatty acids in your diet, within a varied and balanced diet and within the framework of a healthy lifestyle.

cookie.name: Principe
cookie.description: Cookies filled with chocolate cream Delicious cookies, crunchy and tasty, filled with a soft chocolate cream. Ideal for your breakfasts and snacks

cookie.name: Milka choco biscuit
cookie.description: Crispy wheat cookies covered with a layer of Milka milk chocolate on top.

cookie.name: Royal Dansk
cookie.description: Exquisite Royal Dansk Danish butter cookies. The original Danish cookies ideal for coffee or tea. One of the most appetizing Christmas sweets.

cookie.name: Maria Gluten free
cookie.description: Gullón's Gluten-Free Maria Cookies are delicious cookies made with the original recipe, but gluten-free!

cookie.name: Advance Almirón
cookie.description: Advance Almirón Cookies are made with cereals with slowly absorbed and easily assimilated carbohydrates, and provide your baby with a large number of vitamins and minerals.

cookie.name: Mini Shortbread Fingers Walkers
cookie.description: These cookie bites are baked with just 4 ingredients: fresh butter, flour, sugar and salt. The Mini Fingers come in a bag, ideal for snacking and sharing in the car, the office, the park or wherever and whenever you feel like it. The perfect accompaniment to tea, coffee or even ice cream..

cookie.name: Chocolinas
cookie.description: It’s a hard chocolate cookie with an exquisite texture and flavor. Perfect for pairing with coffee or tea, or for making the most delicious cake in all of South America: the Chocotorta (Chocolate + Cake). If you haven't tried it yet, don't wait any longer. It’s an incomparable delight.  Created in 1982 by Marité Mabragaña, a director at an advertising company, the Chocotorta was born from the need to combine two of her clients' products: cream cheese and Bagley’s Chocolina cookies.

cookie.name: Melba
cookie.description: Lemon-flavored cookies: These cookies have a delightful lemon flavor that will brighten any occasion. Proudly made in Argentina: These cookies are crafted in Argentina with pride, using traditional recipes.

cookie.name: Merengadas
cookie.description: Another Argentine classic is Merengadas: vanilla cookies with a strawberry-flavored meringue filling, sprinkled with coconut. Kids love them for their fun factor, bright color, enticing aroma, and the ability to stretch the filling before eating.

reviews.commentText: Nice cookie to have a coffee
Milka is the best but better is the lemon pie i ate for my birthday
Esto es un costurero, no hay galletas.
